core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Productivity tools with Sci-Fi HUD aesthetics.
Emotion First: The user feels like a pilot in a cockpit - in control, focused, powerful.
Content is King: Data is the hero. High contrast, distinct hierarchy.
Negative Space: Use it to reduce cognitive load in dense dashboards.
Contrast: High contrast for text (WCAG AA), subtle depth for containers.
anti_patterns: Purple/Teal primary buttons (unless specific brand accent).

usage_rules: Data/Code: 'JetBrains Mono' - Small size, tabular nums.
Labels: Uppercase, tracking wide (0.1em), tiny text (text-xs).

buttons.style: h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95

cards.style: bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border/40 shadow-sm rounded-lg overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-background border-input ring-offset-background placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}

charts.tooltip: bg-popover/90 backdrop-blur-md border border-border text-popover-foreground rounded-md shadow-lg

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise texture on background for depth.
visual_enhancers.glows: Use colored shadows for primary actions (Neon glow).

creative_assets.landing_background: Animated network nodes using tsparticles or framer-motion svg tracing.

instructions_to_main_agent: Install dependencies: `yarn add framer-motion lenis lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge`.
Configure `tailwind.config.js` with the colors provided in this JSON.
Add the Google Fonts import to `src/index.css`.
Set the body background to `#09090b` in `src/index.css`.
Create a `Layout` component that handles the Sidebar and Topbar structure.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (Use `text-zinc-400` for muted, `text-zinc-100` for primary).
For the Landing Page, implement a 'Tetris' grid layout with bold typography using 'Outfit'.
For Dashboards, use a dense 'Bento' grid with 'Manrope' font.
Implement 'Dark Precision' theme: Dark backgrounds, electric indigo accents, sharp borders.
Use 'lucide-react' for all icons. NO EMOJIS.
universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic outputs. Avoid this.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays separate good from extraordinary.
